resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: When i left Geneva on Thurs it was cold and cloudy but after five minutes in the air we were in the sunshine.  We had a magnificient view of the alps.  ... rather a dreamy wait of hourse in the Paris air-park and we took off for Dakar.  Air France supposed to be a very luxurious ..and I was travelling first class ...apparently when they do not ...competition from other lines ..not so particular.  The plane was noisy but in spite of that I slepft.  Was met at Dohar by ..and to the hotel at 7am.  At 8am they called for me & from then until after 11pm I had only one hour in the afternoon to myself.  Of course they wanted

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: I brought this air-letter at the first opportunity yesterday to send you a ...Then i discovered that there .. from here only Tues & Wed.  This will have to wait until..and will go via Daha and Paris.  With luck you may receive it on the ... which will be the day I leave for my next stop - ...in Sierra Leone
